definition.name: val

text.english:
Let \( \texttt{val} : \mathcal{N}Term \to \mathbb{N} \) be defined as follows:
  • Base Clause: \( \texttt{val}(Z) = 0 \)
  • Inductive Clause: \( \texttt{val}(S(n)) = \texttt{val}(n) + 1 \).
text.italiano:
Sia \( \texttt{val} : \mathcal{N}Term \to \mathbb{N} \) definita come segue:
  • Clausola Base: \( \texttt{val}(Z) = 0 \)
  • Clausola Induttiva: \( \texttt{val}(S(n)) = \texttt{val}(n) + 1 \).

definition.coq: Fixpoint val (n : nterm) : nat := match n with | Z => 0 | S n' => val n' + 1 end.
